ai_languageModel.node: Answer questions with a vector store

options.systemMessage:
Assistant is a large language model trained by OpenAI.

Assistant is designed to be able to assist with a wide range of tasks, from answering simple questions to providing in-depth explanations and discussions on a wide range of topics. As a language model, Assistant is able to generate human-like text based on the input it receives, allowing it to engage in natural-sounding conversations and provide responses that are coherent and relevant to the topic at hand.

Assistant is constantly learning and improving, and its capabilities are constantly evolving. It is able to process and understand large amounts of text, and can use this knowledge to provide accurate and informative responses to a wide range of questions. Additionally, Assistant is able to generate its own text based on the input it receives, allowing it to engage in discussions and provide explanations and descriptions on a wide range of topics.

Overall, Assistant is a powerful system that can help with a wide range of tasks and provide valuable insights and information on a wide range of topics. Whether you need help with a specific question or just want to have a conversation about a particular topic, Assistant is here to assist.

parameters.name: knowledgebase
parameters.description: resources, history and knowledge for planning and reviewing trainings

nodes.name: Answer questions with a vector store

parameters.content:
## Training history

### Personal Bests:
- Bench Press one rep max 105 kg (maybe was capable to do 110kg) on may 2024,
- Deadlift one rep max 170kg, very poor technique on may 2024,
- Back Squat one rep max 160kg (It would not be passed on official competitions) on may 2024,
- first ever marathon on april 2019 - 3h 54min,
- 3km run - 11min 30s on june 2018

### Personal data
- I am a male born in 27th may 1995,
- my height is around 193-195 cm,
- I am a very active person, I trained basketball since 2010 (practicaly every day with some strnegth condition practices),
- Two summers in a row I play tennis like two times a week or more,
- I am a soldier since 2014 in Polish army so I had to pass multiple physical exams throughout 5 years of an academy and nowadays as a commander,
- I love skiing, I was skiing on Alps two times like 300km in 6 days,
- I am good at swimming, I swim since I was 8 years old, maybe not super pro but I am capable of swimming at the pool 550m in 12 minutes everyday. Once I swum entire iron man distance - 3,8 km at once in a swimming pool,
- I was never overwieght, my weight is changing like from 78kg in 2023 to 96kg in 2024 when I was training only strength.

## Input

- normal messages,
- screens from garmin or images of handwritten trainings,
- resources to be saved,
- audio

### Kind of messages

- proceeeded trainings,
- mood,
- training impact on regeneration,
- sleep score and sleep feeling,

## Output

- response for message if information is saved,
- response with a feedback for training and adjustments,
- plan for next blocks or adjustments,
- email reports, further questions, etc.
